name: AVSpeechSynthesizer
desc: An object that produces synthesized speech from text utterances and enables monitoring or controlling of ongoing speech.

items.name: func speak(AVSpeechUtterance)
items.desc: Adds the utterance you specify to the speech synthesizerâ€™s queue.

items.name: func continueSpeaking() -> Bool
items.desc: Resumes speech from its paused point.

items.name: func pauseSpeaking(at: AVSpeechBoundary) -> Bool
items.desc: Pauses speech at the boundary you specify.

items.name: func stopSpeaking(at: AVSpeechBoundary) -> Bool
items.desc: Stops speech at the boundary you specify.

items.name: enum AVSpeechBoundary
items.desc: Specifies when to pause or stop speech.

items.name: var isSpeaking: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the speech synthesizer is speaking or is in a paused state and has utterances to speak.

items.name: var isPaused: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether a speech synthesizer is in a paused state.

items.name: var delegate: AVSpeechSynthesizerDelegate?
items.desc: The delegate object for the speech synthesizer.

items.name: protocol AVSpeechSynthesizerDelegate
items.desc: A delegate protocol that contains optional methods you can implement to respond to events that occur during speech synthesis.

items.name: var usesApplicationAudioSession: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that specifies whether the app manages the audio session.

items.name: var mixToTelephonyUplink: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that specifies whether to send synthesized speech to an active call.

items.name: var outputChannels: [AVAudioSessionChannelDescription]?
items.desc: An array of audio session channels to route generated speech.

items.name: func write(AVSpeechUtterance, toBufferCallback: AVSpeechSynthesizer.BufferCallback)
items.desc: Generates speech for the utterance and invokes the callback with the audio buffer.

items.name: typealias AVSpeechSynthesizer.BufferCallback
items.desc: A type that defines a callback that receives a buffer of generated speech.
